td.p: North West Company. Agreement 1804 and Agreement 1802. An electronic transcription. MFTP #0027

div.p: Simon McTavish Jno Gregory William McGillivray and Duncan McGillivray William Hallowell and Roderic McKenzie now composing said House of or Firm of McTavish Frobisher and Company Angus Shaw the said Roderic McKenzie Alexr McLeod Wm Thorburn Daniel McKenzie Wm McKay Jno McDonald, Donald McTavish Jno McDonell Archd Nord McLeod Alexander McDougal Chars Chaboilles John Sayer Peter Grant Alex. Fraser Eneas Cameron John Finlay Duncan Cameron James Hughes Alex. McKay Hugh McGillis Alex: Henry J Bte Cadotte John McGillivray James Mackenzie and Simon Fraser concuring it essentially necessary to alter and Change the aforesaid Articles of agreement and to form a more regular solid permanent System for the Government and Regulations of the Various Rights and Interests of the Parties concerned in the said trade and commerce in order thereby and by a Mutual confidence and good understanding to unite and consolidate their Interests in Such manner as to render all attempts which now are or hereafter may be made by other persons to injure them in their said trade and Commerce fruitless and ineffectual and above all to preserve and Secure to the said Parties Concerned their Heirs and assign the many benifits and advantages which by these united labours and exertions in the said Indian Country they have become entitled to reap and receive in the further continuance of the said trade and commerce and Particularly from the enlarged plan of Carrying on the Same and the increased number of Outfits and other expences which have become necessary for that purpose and which must eventually be productive of great
